name: VPET Planets Lite
description:
Embrace nostalgia once again.

Get transported back to the 90’s with this modern adaptation of the keychain pets we all know and love. Just like these devices you’ll need to raise, care, train, clean and feed your VPET so it can evolve into even more powerful creatures.

Features:
- Three different planets worth of VPETs ***
- The ability to simultaneously raise 3 VPETs at once ***
- Five different branches of VPETs per planet to evolve up and train
- Unique stats for every pet
- Battling system to allow your VPETs to prove their strength

As your VPET evolves it will get stronger depending on how you treated it. Will you train the strongest VPET in the world?
